description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38253) affecting the Windows Win32 kernel subsystem:

1. Identify the applicable KB updates that address this vulnerability based on your system version:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2: KB5043080
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5043076
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: KB5043076
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2: KB5043067

2. Download the appropriate KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - [KB5043067](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043067)
   - [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
   - [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)

3. Install the updates on your system. Ensure to restart your machine after installation to apply changes.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system version matches the KB updates being applied.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.

**Details**:
- These updates resolve the vulnerability that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges on the system. Ensure all components are updated to enhance system security.
